name: Colour Rush
description:
The player must get from the starting point to the end of the map. In order to do so, the player must choose one of the four platforms presented in the level to progress. If the player chooses the incorrect platform, they will be sent back to the starting point. If the player falls off the platform, they will be sent back to the starting point. Good luck!

Controls of the game:

left/right arrow key: move left and right

z: jump

hold down z: jump higher 

NOTE: MUST BE LOWER CASE Z
